# Ellio Solutions Website - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Modern Next.js website for ellio.solutions featuring professional design with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and responsive components.

## Setup Checklist

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md
- [ ] Scaffold Next.js project with TypeScript, Tailwind, and App Router
- [ ] Customize project structure with components and pages
- [ ] Verify build and setup compilation
- [ ] Create VS Code development task
- [ ] Update README documentation

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow Tailwind CSS utility-first approach
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Ensure responsive design for all screen sizes
- Use the App Router pattern for file-based routing

## Running the Project
```bash
npm run dev
```

The site will be available at http://localhost:3000
